Articles.Content:
Dunno who around here likes this kind of music, its reminiscent of what I used to make. A flowing beat with pads and arps. I was tempted to try to use this in IG Maker but I never do get far in with those game makers before I lose interest in the project.

I digress, let me know what you think!

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/trigger-effect
